text: is a 1935 Japanese drama movie directed by Yasujirō Ozu and starring Takeshi Sakamoto, Tokkan Kozo, Yoshiko Okada, Choko Iida, Chishū Ryū. It was distributed by Shochiku. ==Other websites== * Category:1935 drama movies Category:Silent movies Category:Japanese drama movies Category:Movies directed by Yasujirō Ozu
title: An Inn in Tokyo
